messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

site decommission hello please informed delete site requested more questions regarding hesitate ask kind regards engineer october pm site decommission hello please queue kind regards analyst ext hub october re migration how information hello site closed needed anymore thank thursday migration how information hello move beyond beta phase excited transition site which launched st moved site simple tv old order complete transition please upload files location within next couple days help prepared easy guides site scroll next two weeks files old after old become two weeks means unable change upload files download moment after date proceed closing down he find guides community useful encounter issues let kindly note deadline site file transfer october enjoy browsing looking forward thank kind regards ext hub
